    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int playerID,
              java.lang.String playerName)
        Constructor for a player-object.
        Parameters:
        playerID - is the playerID of the player. Player one will have the ID of 1 etc.
        playerName - is the name of the player.

      • Player

        public Player(int playerID,
              java.lang.String playerName,
              int fortune,
              int jailRounds,
              int jailToken,
              int currentPosition)
        Constructor for a player object loaded from the database.
        Parameters:
        playerID - is the playerID of the player.
        playerName - is the name of the player.
        fortune - is the amount of money held by a player.
        jailRounds - is the amount of rounds left for a player in jail.
        jailToken - is the amount of tokens held by a player.
        currentPosition - is the player's current position.

        public int getCurrentPosition()
        used to get the player's current position.
        Returns:
        currentPosition is the player's current position.

      • setCurrentPosition

        public void setCurrentPosition(int addToPosition)
        used to set the current position of the player. also sets prevPosition to the player's current position. updates the player's position with the amount defined in addToPosition. if the player's position exceeds 40 (the amount of fields on the board) it will subtract 40 from his position in order to make him go around the board in a circular motion.
        Parameters:
        addToPosition - is the amount to add to the player's position.

      • changePosition

        public void changePosition(int newPosition)
        used to change a player's position.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - is the player's new position.

      • setOwnedFerries

        public void setOwnedFerries(int ferriesOwned)
        used to set the amount of ferries owned by a player.
        Parameters:
        ferriesOwned - is the amount to add to the amount ferries owned by a player.

      • getOwnedFerries

        public int getOwnedFerries()
        used to get the amount of ferries owned by a player.
        Returns:
        ownedFerries is the amount of ferries owned by a player.

      • isBankRupt

        public boolean isBankRupt()
        used to see whether or not a player is bankrupt, which is determined by whether or not his/her totalAssets is at/or below 0.
